name/OS/2

MS NID 4

Width Names Full Font Name NID4

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Athiti SemiBold'

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.033' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.033'.

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'Athiti-SemiBold'

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Athiti-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Athiti-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'SemiBold'

Error

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'CadsonDemak', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.cadsondemak.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.cadsondemak.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Warning

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

NID 13 (3, 1, 1033, 13)

'License Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)[
][
]This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.[
]This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:[
]http://scripts.sil.org/OFL[
][
][
]-----------------------------------------------------------[
]SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007[
]-----------------------------------------------------------[
][
]PREAMBLE[
]The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide[
]development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation[
]efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and[
]open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership[
]with others.[
][
]The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and[
]redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The[
]fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded, [
]redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved[
]names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,[
]however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The[
]requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply[
]to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.[
][
]DEFINITIONS[
]"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright[
]Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may[
]include source files, build scripts and documentation.[
][
]"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the[
]copyright statement(s).[
][
]"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as[
]distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).[
][
]"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,[
]or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the[
]Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a[
]new environment.[
][
]"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical[
]writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.[
][
]PERMISSION & CONDITIONS[
]Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining[
]a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,[
]redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font[
]Software, subject to the following conditions:[
][
]1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,[
]in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.[
][
]2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,[
]redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy[
]contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be[
]included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or[
]in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or[
]binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.[
][
]3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font[
]Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding[
]Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as[
]presented to the users.[
][
]4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font[
]Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any[
]Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the[
]Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written[
]permission.[
][
]5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,[
]must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be[
]distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to[
]remain under this license does not apply to any document created[
]using the Font Software.[
][
]TERMINATION[
]This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are[
]not met.[
][
]DISCLAIMER[
]THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,[
]EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF[
]MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT[
]OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE[
]COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,[
]INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL[
]DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING[
]FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM[
]OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.'

Error

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'CadsonDemak' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)

This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:
http://scripts.sil.org/OFL


-----------------------------------------------------------
SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007
-----------------------------------------------------------

PREAMBLE
The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide
development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation
efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and
open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership
with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and
redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The
fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded,
redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved
names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,
however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The
requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply
to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.

DEFINITIONS
"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright
Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may
include source files, build scripts and documentation.

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the
copyright statement(s).

"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as
distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,
or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the
Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a
new environment.

"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical
writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.

PERMISSION & CONDITIONS
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining
a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,
redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font
Software, subject to the following conditions:

1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,
in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.

2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,
redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy
contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be
included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or
in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or
binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.

3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font
Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding
Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as
presented to the users.

4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font
Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any
Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the
Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written
permission.

5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,
must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be
distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to
remain under this license does not apply to any document created
using the Font Software.

TERMINATION
This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are
not met.

DISCLAIMER
THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT
OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,
INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING
FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM
OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Athiti' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold' = NID 1 'Athiti SemiBold'.

Pass

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

-----------------------------------------------------------
SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007
-----------------------------------------------------------

PREAMBLE
The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide
development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation
efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and
open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership
with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and
redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The
fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded,
redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved
names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,
however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The
requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply
to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.

DEFINITIONS
"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright
Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may
include source files, build scripts and documentation.

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the
copyright statement(s).

"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as
distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,
or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the
Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a
new environment.

"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical
writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.

PERMISSION & CONDITIONS
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining
a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,
redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font
Software, subject to the following conditions:

1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,
in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.

2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,
redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy
contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be
included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or
in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or
binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.

3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font
Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding
Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as
presented to the users.

4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font
Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any
Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the
Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written
permission.

5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,
must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be
distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to
remain under this license does not apply to any document created
using the Font Software.

TERMINATION
This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are
not met.

DISCLAIMER
THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT
OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,
INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING
FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM
OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)

This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:
http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide
development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation
efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and
open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership
with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and
redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The
fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded,
redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved
names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,
however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The
requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply
to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.

DEFINITIONS

Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may
include source files, build scripts and documentation.

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the
copyright statement(s).

"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as
distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,
or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the
Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a
new environment.

"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical
writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.

a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,
redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font
Software, subject to the following conditions:

1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,
in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.

2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,
redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy
contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be
included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or
in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or
binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.

3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font
Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding
Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as
presented to the users.

4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font
Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any
Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the
Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written
permission.

5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,
must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be
distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to
remain under this license does not apply to any document created
using the Font Software.

not met.

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 3, Unique Font Identifier' (Mac/Roman/English)

Unique Font Identifier is present.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

'Athiti'

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '11'
'Athiti-Bold'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Athiti-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Athiti-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'CadsonDemak', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

NID 13 (1, 0, 0, 13)

'License Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)[
][
]This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.[
]This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:[
]http://scripts.sil.org/OFL[
][
][
]-----------------------------------------------------------[
]SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007[
]-----------------------------------------------------------[
][
]PREAMBLE[
]The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide[
]development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation[
]efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and[
]open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership[
]with others.[
][
]The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and[
]redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The[
]fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded, [
]redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved[
]names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,[
]however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The[
]requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply[
]to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.[
][
]DEFINITIONS[
]"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright[
]Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may[
]include source files, build scripts and documentation.[
][
]"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the[
]copyright statement(s).[
][
]"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as[
]distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).[
][
]"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,[
]or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the[
]Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a[
]new environment.[
][
]"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical[
]writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.[
][
]PERMISSION & CONDITIONS[
]Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining[
]a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,[
]redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font[
]Software, subject to the following conditions:[
][
]1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,[
]in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.[
][
]2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,[
]redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy[
]contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be[
]included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or[
]in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or[
]binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.[
][
]3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font[
]Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding[
]Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as[
]presented to the users.[
][
]4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font[
]Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any[
]Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the[
]Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written[
]permission.[
][
]5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,[
]must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be[
]distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to[
]remain under this license does not apply to any document created[
]using the Font Software.[
][
]TERMINATION[
]This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are[
]not met.[
][
]DISCLAIMER[
]THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,[
]EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF[
]MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT[
]OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE[
]COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,[
]INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL[
]DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING[
]FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM[
]OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.'

Error

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'CadsonDemak' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)

This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:
http://scripts.sil.org/OFL


-----------------------------------------------------------
SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007
-----------------------------------------------------------

PREAMBLE
The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide
development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation
efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and
open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership
with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and
redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The
fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded,
redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved
names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,
however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The
requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply
to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.

DEFINITIONS
"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright
Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may
include source files, build scripts and documentation.

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the
copyright statement(s).

"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as
distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,
or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the
Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a
new environment.

"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical
writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.

PERMISSION & CONDITIONS
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining
a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,
redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font
Software, subject to the following conditions:

1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,
in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.

2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,
redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy
contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be
included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or
in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or
binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.

3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font
Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding
Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as
presented to the users.

4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font
Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any
Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the
Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written
permission.

5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,
must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be
distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to
remain under this license does not apply to any document created
using the Font Software.

TERMINATION
This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are
not met.

DISCLAIMER
THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT
OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,
INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING
FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM
OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31.

OK: NID 4 length is '11'
'Athiti Bold'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Athiti Bold' = NID 1 'Athiti' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Reserved word used in Full Font Name NID4 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 4 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Should be camel case Full Font Name NID4

NID 4: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

Check style extentions Full Font Name NID4

NID 4 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Xtra, Extra, Semi, Sm, Ultra, Ex, Dm, Demi, X'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name/OS/2

MS NID 4

Width Names Full Font Name NID4

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Athiti Bold'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.033' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.033'.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '11'
'Athiti-Bold'

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Athiti-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Athiti-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

MS NID 6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'CadsonDemak', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.cadsondemak.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

NID 13 (3, 1, 1033, 13)

'License Description' has invalid entry.

Name table entry contains line break, but shouldn't:
'Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)[
][
]This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.[
]This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:[
]http://scripts.sil.org/OFL[
][
][
]-----------------------------------------------------------[
]SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007[
]-----------------------------------------------------------[
][
]PREAMBLE[
]The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide[
]development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation[
]efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and[
]open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership[
]with others.[
][
]The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and[
]redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The[
]fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded, [
]redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved[
]names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,[
]however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The[
]requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply[
]to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.[
][
]DEFINITIONS[
]"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright[
]Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may[
]include source files, build scripts and documentation.[
][
]"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the[
]copyright statement(s).[
][
]"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as[
]distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).[
][
]"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,[
]or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the[
]Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a[
]new environment.[
][
]"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical[
]writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.[
][
]PERMISSION & CONDITIONS[
]Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining[
]a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,[
]redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font[
]Software, subject to the following conditions:[
][
]1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,[
]in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.[
][
]2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,[
]redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy[
]contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be[
]included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or[
]in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or[
]binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.[
][
]3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font[
]Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding[
]Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as[
]presented to the users.[
][
]4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font[
]Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any[
]Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the[
]Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written[
]permission.[
][
]5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,[
]must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be[
]distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to[
]remain under this license does not apply to any document created[
]using the Font Software.[
][
]TERMINATION[
]This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are[
]not met.[
][
]DISCLAIMER[
]THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,[
]EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF[
]MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT[
]OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE[
]COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,[
]INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL[
]DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING[
]FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM[
]OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.'

Error

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'CadsonDemak' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)

This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:
http://scripts.sil.org/OFL


-----------------------------------------------------------
SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007
-----------------------------------------------------------

PREAMBLE
The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide
development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation
efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and
open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership
with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and
redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The
fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded,
redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved
names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,
however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The
requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply
to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.

DEFINITIONS
"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright
Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may
include source files, build scripts and documentation.

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the
copyright statement(s).

"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as
distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,
or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the
Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a
new environment.

"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical
writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.

PERMISSION & CONDITIONS
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining
a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,
redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font
Software, subject to the following conditions:

1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,
in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.

2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,
redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy
contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be
included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or
in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or
binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.

3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font
Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding
Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as
presented to the users.

4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font
Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any
Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the
Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written
permission.

5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,
must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be
distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to
remain under this license does not apply to any document created
using the Font Software.

TERMINATION
This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are
not met.

DISCLAIMER
THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT
OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,
INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING
FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM
OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

SIL OPEN FONT LICENSE Version 1.1 - 26 February 2007
-----------------------------------------------------------

PREAMBLE
The goals of the Open Font License (OFL) are to stimulate worldwide
development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation
efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and
open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership
with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and
redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The
fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded,
redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved
names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,
however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The
requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply
to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.

DEFINITIONS
"Font Software" refers to the set of files released by the Copyright
Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may
include source files, build scripts and documentation.

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the
copyright statement(s).

"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as
distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,
or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the
Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a
new environment.

"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical
writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.

PERMISSION & CONDITIONS
Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining
a copy of the Font Software, to use, study, copy, merge, embed, modify,
redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font
Software, subject to the following conditions:

1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,
in Original or Modified Versions, may be sold by itself.

2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,
redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy
contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be
included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or
in the appropriate machine-readable metadata fields within text or
binary files as long as those fields can be easily viewed by the user.

3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font
Name(s) unless explicit written permission is granted by the corresponding
Copyright Holder. This restriction only applies to the primary font name as
presented to the users.

4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font
Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any
Modified Version, except to acknowledge the contribution(s) of the
Copyright Holder(s) and the Author(s) or with their explicit written
permission.

5) The Font Software, modified or unmodified, in part or in whole,
must be distributed entirely under this license, and must not be
distributed under any other license. The requirement for fonts to
remain under this license does not apply to any document created
using the Font Software.

TERMINATION
This license becomes null and void if any of the above conditions are
not met.

DISCLAIMER
THE FONT SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ANY WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT
OF COPYRIGHT, PATENT, TRADEMARK, OR OTHER RIGHT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
COPYRIGHT HOLDER BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY,
INCLUDING ANY GENERAL, SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING
FROM, OUT OF THE USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE FONT SOFTWARE OR FROM
OTHER DEALINGS IN THE FONT SOFTWARE.'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2015, Cadson Demak (info@cadsondemak.com)

This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
This license is copied below, and is also available with a FAQ at:
http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

development of collaborative font projects, to support the font creation
efforts of academic and linguistic communities, and to provide a free and
open framework in which fonts may be shared and improved in partnership
with others.

The OFL allows the licensed fonts to be used, studied, modified and
redistributed freely as long as they are not sold by themselves. The
fonts, including any derivative works, can be bundled, embedded,
redistributed and/or sold with any software provided that any reserved
names are not used by derivative works. The fonts and derivatives,
however, cannot be released under any other type of license. The
requirement for fonts to remain under this license does not apply
to any document created using the fonts or their derivatives.

Holder(s) under this license and clearly marked as such. This may
include source files, build scripts and documentation.

"Reserved Font Name" refers to any names specified as such after the
copyright statement(s).

"Original Version" refers to the collection of Font Software components as
distributed by the Copyright Holder(s).

"Modified Version" refers to any derivative made by adding to, deleting,
or substituting -- in part or in whole -- any of the components of the
Original Version, by changing formats or by porting the Font Software to a
new environment.

"Author" refers to any designer, engineer, programmer, technical
writer or other person who contributed to the Font Software.

redistribute, and sell modified and unmodified copies of the Font
Software, subject to the following conditions:

1) Neither the Font Software nor any of its individual components,

2) Original or Modified Versions of the Font Software may be bundled,
redistributed and/or sold with any software, provided that each copy
contains the above copyright notice and this license. These can be
included either as stand-alone text files, human-readable headers or

3) No Modified Version of the Font Software may use the Reserved Font

presented to the users.

4) The name(s) of the Copyright Holder(s) or the Author(s) of the Font
Software shall not be used to promote, endorse or advertise any

permission.

name

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 16, Typographic Family Name' (Mac/Roman/English)

Typographic Family Name NID 16 (Mac/Roman/English) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Error

Pass

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Pass

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1000) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

hhea

Vertical Metrics

Pull hhea Metrics

hhea.ascent: 1150
hhea.descent: -450
hhea.lineGap: 0

Info

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 sTypo Metrics

OS2.sTypoAscender: 750
OS2.sTypoDescender: -250
OS2.sTypoLineGap: 200

Info

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

Vertical Metrics

Pull OS/2 usWin Metrics

OS2.usWinAscent: 1150
OS2.usWinDescent: 450

Info

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

xAvgCharWidth

Get 'OS/2' xAvgCharWidth.

xAvgCharWidth = 560.

Info

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

hhea

advanceWidthMax

Get advanceWidthMax.

advanceWidthMax = 1082.

Info

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

hhea

xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax

Get xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax.

xMin: -616
yMin: -452
xMax: 1022
yMax: 1108

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

OS/2

sTypoAscender

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoAscender' shouldn't be negative.

sTypoAscender = '750'.

Pass

OS/2

sTypoDescender

Vertical Metrics 'sTypoDescender' should be negative.

sTypoDescender = '-250'.

Pass

sTypoLineGap = '200'.

lineGap

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Athiti Light Regular (Athiti-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Athiti Regular (Athiti-Regular.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Athiti Medium Regular (Athiti-Medium.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Athiti SemiBold Regular (Athiti-SemiBold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Athiti Bold (Athiti-Bold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

OT Features

OT Features

Error

Athiti ExtraLight Regular (Athiti-ExtraLight.ttf)

GSUB

sinf

If there is a feature subs, then the sinf feature should be there, too. Otherwise InDesign will mark it not existing.

There is a subs feature in the font, but the sinf is missing. Please investigate.

Error

Athiti Light Regular (Athiti-Light.ttf)

GSUB

sinf

If there is a feature subs, then the sinf feature should be there, too. Otherwise InDesign will mark it not existing.

There is a subs feature in the font, but the sinf is missing. Please investigate.

Error
